titles.title: Homeowners Financing Protection Act
Homeowners Financing Protection Act

To amend the rural housing loan guarantee program under section 502(h) of the Housing Act of 1949 to provide loan guarantees for loans made to refinance existing mortgage loans guaranteed under such section.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Banking and Financial Services.

bill.summary: 9/19/2000--Passed House amended. Homeowners Financing Protection Act - Amends the Housing Act of 1949 to permit sec. 502 refinancing loan guarantees for single family low-and moderate-income mortgages guaranteed under the sec. 502 rural housing loan program. Sets forth refinancing loan requirements.
